column1: The match between the US and Wales ended in a 1-1 draw
column2: with the US dominating the first half with a lively performance and Wales responding with a more direct approach in the second. Both teams are content with the result
column3: but Wales is especially pleased to have salvaged something from a game they had difficulty getting a grip on in the first half. Bale was the hero for Wales
column4: scoring the equalizer late in the game.
